lore: The Carnages were born of the pain and darkness that Erebyss always carries in her heart.\n\nAny warrior who has fought a Carnage Destructor and lived to tell the tale knows that letting them get close is a terrible idea. These creatures are capable of attacking multiple targets at once by swinging their sharp tails while biting or tearing at another opponent.
menagerieDialog: (Even while it's not moving, its mere presence is terrifying.)
(Let's face it - there's never a time when this creature will be happy.)
(You can't help but notice that your other creatures are absolutely terrified of this one.)
(This creature's appetite is insatiable. You can't remember the last time you didn't see it devouring a giant chunk of raw, bloody meat.)
(It's sniffing at the air in search of prey. Hopefully, it doesn't find any in your castle.)
name: Carnage Destructor
